Welcome to SMART

SMART is a robust framework for integration of medical apps into EMR systems. With SMART you can write your apps once and run them everythere there is medical data, because SMART's API and data models provide an EMR-agnostic layer of abstraction that you can rely upon.

Get Started Now! »

Easy data retrieval with SMART Connect

    SMART.get_medications().success(function(response){
        $.each(response.objects.of_type.Medication, function(i, med){
            document.write(med.drugName.dcterms__title + "<br/>");
        })
    });
